post/2003/Tidying Up Here and There

date

2003-03-22
tags

nownote/2003

I’m not a big fan of politics or politicians, so I earnestly hope the current world mess clears up as soon as possible. My sympathies go out to the world at large, while I look at the job market in Canada. Heck, I’ve always liked the Red Green Show and ZeD, so why not? ;-) There aren’t many visible changes to the site. Internally, there was a massive shift - all of the content is now formatted as EtText, which makes the raw ‘source’ of the site quite a bit easier to read. That’s good, because you want to make 2000+ lines of content as easy to read as possible.

Only 2000 lines? I need to add some more pages.
